name: Innovative IT Services
description: Innovative IT Services is a live, 24/7,
overview: Innovative IT Services is a total IT solutions provider. We supply, install, manage and maintain your business technology. This is the center of our support network which now remotely manages our customers IT equipment anywhere in the world . As suppliers of many leading brands of IT hardware and software, we use best of type solutions to provide our customers with best results, the best performance, the best reliability and the best price enabling our customers to stay focused on their core business. Innovative IT Services engineers are available not only to support your equipment, but also have the necessary skills and expertise to assist you with selecting and purchasing the most cost effective solutions for your particular type of business. Our customers range from consultants with just one machine to SMEs with 50-60 machines. Each of these customers face critical moments when viruses occur, faults develop or a machine is lost or stolen. Innovative IT Services has the ability and knowledge gained over many years within the IT industry to be able to manage these emergency situations on your behalf, smoothly and efficiently.
